00028 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel) WaitingPanelMap[]={
00029   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00030   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::ID_NYI, RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::onNotYetImplemented),
00031   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::ID_RUN_CLIENT, RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::onRunClient),
00032 
00033 };

00035 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel,FXPacker,WaitingPanelMap,ARRAYNUMBER(WaitingPanelMap));

00046 RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::
00047 WaitingPanel(FXComposite *parent,FXuint opts, EnetFlooderClient* c)
00048   :FXPacker(parent, opts)
00049 {
00050 
00051   this->client=c;
00052   FXVerticalFrame *root = new FXVerticalFrame(this,
00053              LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00054 
00055   // The help label
00056   FXString lab="This panel is shown for waiting connection to the "
00057     "selected server. Click the 'Run' button to starting connection.";
00058   FXLabel* labAdminName=new FXLabel(root, lab);
00059 
00060   // The progress bar frame
00061   FXVerticalFrame *frProg = new FXVerticalFrame(root,
00062              LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00063   prog=new  FXProgressBar(frProg, this, ID_NYI, 
00064         PROGRESSBAR_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X|PROGRESSBAR_PERCENTAGE );
00065   prog->setTotal(5);
00066 
00067   // The steps labels
00068   labStep1=new FXLabel(frProg, "Initializing client");
00069   labStep2=new FXLabel(frProg, "Connecting client to selected server");
00070   labStep3=new FXLabel(frProg, "Sending identification packet");
00071   labStep4=new FXLabel(frProg, "Waiting for server's response");
00072 
00073   // The buttons
00074   FXHorizontalFrame *frButtons = new FXHorizontalFrame(frProg,
00075              LAYOUT_FILL_X|PACK_UNIFORM_WIDTH);
00076   FXButton* btnRun=new FXButton(frButtons, "Run", NULL, this, 
00077                                 ID_RUN_CLIENT, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_CENTER_X);
00078 
00079   FXButton* btnRefresh=new FXButton(frButtons, "Cancel", NULL, this, 
00080                                     ID_NYI, BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_CENTER_X);
00081 
00082 
00083   // Disable all steps
00084   setAllStepsDisable();
00085 
00086 }

00091 RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::~WaitingPanel(){
00092   delete prog;
00093   delete labStep1;
00094   delete labStep2;
00095   delete labStep3;
00096   delete labStep4;
00097 
00098   prog=NULL;
00099   labStep1=NULL;
00100   labStep2=NULL;
00101   labStep3=NULL;
00102   labStep4=NULL;
00103 
00104   // Set to NULL but not deleted
00105   server=NULL;
00106   client=NULL;
00107 }

00130 long RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::
00131 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00132   LOGW("Not yet implemented");
00133   return 1;
00134 }

00139 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::setAllStepsDisable(){
00140   labStep1->disable();
00141   labStep2->disable();
00142   labStep3->disable();
00143   labStep4->disable();
00144 }
00145 
00154 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::setStepEnable(unsigned int i){
00155   setAllStepsDisable();
00156 
00157   FXLabel* lab;
00158 
00159   switch(i){
00160   case 1:
00161     lab=labStep1;
00162     break;
00163 
00164   case 2:
00165     lab=labStep2;
00166     break;
00167 
00168   case 3:
00169     lab=labStep3;
00170     break;
00171 
00172   case 4:
00173     lab=labStep4;
00174     break;
00175 
00176   default:
00177     lab=NULL;
00178   }
00179 
00180   if (lab){
00181     lab->enable();
00182   }
00183 }
00184 
00192 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::runClient(){
00193   // Step 1 : call the EnetFlooderClient constructor
00194   setStepEnable(1);
00195   client=new EnetFlooderClient();
00196   prog->increment(1);
00197 
00198   client->sigConnectionAccepted.connect(sigc::mem_fun(this, 
00199      &RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::slotConnectionAccepted));
00200 
00201   client->sigConnectionRefused.connect(sigc::mem_fun(this, 
00202      &RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::slotConnectionRefused));
00203 
00204   client->sigConnectionUndefined.connect(sigc::mem_fun(this, 
00205      &RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::slotConnectionUndefined));
00206 
00207 
00208   const char* ip=server->ipAdress;
00209   int port=StringConv::getSingleton().ctoi(server->port);
00210   prog->increment(1);
00211   LOGCATS("Running on server ");
00212   LOGCATS(ip);
00213   LOGCATS(":");
00214   LOGCATI(port);
00215   LOGCAT();
00216 
00217   // Step 2
00218   int waitingTime=200;
00219   setStepEnable(2);
00220   prog->increment(1);
00221 
00222   client->connect(ip, port, waitingTime);
00223   prog->increment(1);
00224  
00225   // Creating packet
00226   setStepEnable(3);
00227   npIdentification * ident=new npIdentification();
00228   ident->setClientType(NCT_FLOODER);
00229   client->sendPacket(ident);
00230   prog->increment(1);
00231 
00232   // Waiting for server's response
00233   setStepEnable(4);
00234   client->eventLoop();
00235 
00236 }
00237 
00247 long RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::
00248 onRunClient(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00249 
00250   LOGI("onRunClient called");
00251   runClient();
00252   return 1;
00253 }
00254 
00262 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::setServer(tServerListItem* it){
00263   server=it;
00264 }
00265 
00269 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::slotConnectionAccepted(){
00270   LOGI("Received a connectionAccepted signal");
00271   prog->increment(1);
00272   sigConnectionAccepted.emit();
00273 }
00274 
00278 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::slotConnectionRefused(){
00279   LOGI("Received a connectionRefused signal");
00280   prog->increment(1);
00281   FXuint resp=FX::FXMessageBox::information(this, FX::MBOX_OK ,
00282                 "Server's technical note", 
00283             "The server refuses flooder connection.");
00284 
00285   sigConnectionRefused.emit();
00286 }
00287 
00293 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::slotConnectionUndefined(){
00294   LOGE("The server connection response is undefined, assuming it is refused");
00295   prog->increment(1);
00296 }
00297 
00301 void RainbruRPG::Gui::WaitingPanel::reset(){
00302   setAllStepsDisable();
00303   prog->setProgress(0);
00304 }
